text: I know world building is so cool! sounds like an interesting idea you have for a game, although probably massive in scope! :smile:
which sources are you using to learn python and visual basic?

also, for this mentorship, now that we've learned a bit more about each other, I thought perhaps we can set up a recurring catch up - maybe once a week? that should be enough time to have some updates to discuss, and for you to prepare questions etc :slightly_smiling_face: what do you think? this way it can be a bit more structured!
